body.p: City in Zebulun’s territory (Jos 19:15), given to the Levites for an inheritance (21:35). Zebulun’s tribe was unable to drive the Canaanites from the city, so they forced them into hard labor (Jgs 1:30, “Nahalol”). The exact location of the city is unknown. Some possible locations include Tell el-Beida, south of modern Nahalal, and Tell en-Nahl, north of the Kishon River and near the southern end of the plain of Acco, near modern Nahalal.
